mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.GA (PARTNO, PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS, MPSNO) values (#{partno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{machineno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proctime,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{starttime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{mpsno,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select PARTNO, PROCESSNO, MACHINENO, PROCTIME, STARTTIME, ENDTIME, STATUS, MPSNO from WISDOM.GA
